title: How to Make Unicorn Hot Chocolate

steps.headline: Pour the milk, half-and-half, white chocolate chips, and vanilla extract into a saucepan.
Put the stove onto medium heat and whisk continually until the mixture is hot.
steps.description: Do not let the hot chocolate mixture boil or bubble.

steps.headline: Stir in the food coloring and mix until the shade is bright and vibrant.
Pour the hot chocolate into mugs.
Garnish the hot chocolate with whipped cream and marshmallows.
Sprinkle the cereal and sprinkles over the hot chocolate.
Serve once it's cooled to lukewarm.
steps.description: Consider placing the mugs on a colorful tray with glitter over it for a vibrant presentation. Enjoy!

text: Pour the milk, half-and-half, white chocolate chips, and vanilla extract into a saucepan.  Put the stove onto medium heat and whisk continually until the mixture is hot. Do not let the hot chocolate mixture boil or bubble. Shut off the stove.  Stir in the food coloring and mix until the shade is bright and vibrant.  Pour the hot chocolate into mugs.  Garnish the hot chocolate with whipped cream and marshmallows.  Sprinkle the cereal and sprinkles over the hot chocolate.  Serve once it's cooled to lukewarm. Consider placing the mugs on a colorful tray with glitter over it for a vibrant presentation. Enjoy!
